/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting with the more muted tones of the buildings.
